segments.text: Wei ! This is a first-you didn't bargain !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Bargain ? I'd feel way too guilty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you could have saved money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: From a sweet ma ? ! It's not worth it . Plus , I'd happily pay more for these things I bought !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: F . Y . I . , there is a flea market nearby , but maybe you're done ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ha ! I'm just warming up ! Please take me there now !
segments.speaker: S2
